Description: Create a tornado filled with flames and molten rocks, swirling violently and incinerating all caught within.
Summon a sandstorm infused with fire, scorching winds, and sharp stones that tear through everything in its path.
Call forth a tempest of volcanic ash, fire, and wind that engulfs the battlefield, creating havoc.
Cause an earthquake that cracks open the ground, releasing blasts of fire and sending out windborne rocks.
Unleash a force that breaks the very world, combining the power of fire, air, earth, and lightning in an unstoppable surge.
